des: "This dish combines the complementary colors and flavors of avocado, lime, green onion, tomato, garlic and cilantro with chili.  The whole lot is dressed over a bed of pasta to complete the meal."
ins:
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.   Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
In a small bowl combine avocado and lime juice.
In a separate bowl combine chili, green onion, tomatoes, garlic and cilantro.
Serve pasta topped with chili mixture and avocado.
